data.name: CannotLoadFile
data.value: Cannot load '{0}' for the following reason:

data.name: CannotSaveFile
data.value: Cannot save '{0}' for the following reason:

data.name: CannotLoadMapFile
data.value: Cannot load map file '{0}' for the following reason:

data.name: CannotPrint
data.value: Cannot print '{0}' for the following reason:

data.name: CannotCreateFile
data.value: Cannot create '{0}' for the following reason:

data.name: CannotCreateDirectory
data.value: Cannot create folder '{0}' for the following reason:

data.name: CannotReadMap
data.value: Cannot read map for the following reason: '{0}' Using Optimize/Repair and re-saving in OCAD may fix problems.

data.name: CannotCreateOcadFiles
data.value: Cannot create OCAD files for the following reason:

data.name: SaveChanges
data.value: Do you want to save the changes you made to '{0}'?

data.name: FileAlreadyExists
data.value: File '{0}' already exists in the specified folder. Click the "Back" button and choose a new folder or a new event title.

data.name: CodeInUse
data.value: The control code '{0}' is already used by another control.

data.name: BadScore
data.value: The points for a control must be an integer 1-999.

data.name: BadClimb
data.value: The climb for a course must be a number 0-9999, or blank.

data.name: BadLoad
data.value: The load for a course must be an integer 0-999999, or blank.

data.name: EnterDimensions
data.value: Enter feature size Use / for height on a slope Use | for two features

data.name: EnterEventTitle
data.value: Enter new event title Use | to separate lines (affects all courses)

data.name: EnterSecondaryTitle
data.value: Enter new secondary title Use | to separate lines

data.name: EnterSymbolText
data.value: Enter new symbol meaning (affects all courses)

data.name: EnterTextLine
data.value: Enter new text Use | to separate lines

data.name: DeleteMultipleControlsFromControlsCollection
data.value: Controls {0} are no longer used by any course. Do you want to delete these controls from the control collection?

data.name: DeleteControlFromControlsCollection
data.value: Control {0} is no longer used by any course. Do you want to delete this control from the control collection?

data.name: DeleteControlFromAllControls
data.value: Control {0} is currently used by the following courses: {1}. Do you want to delete this control anyway?

data.name: CodeBadLength
data.value: A control code must be one, two, or three letters or digits.

data.name: CodeContainsSpace
data.value: A control code must not contain a space.

data.name: CodeBeginsWithZero
data.value: A control code should not begin with zero.

data.name: CodeCouldBeUpsideDown
data.value: A control code should not look like another number when upside-down.

data.name: DuplicateCode
data.value: The code "{0}" is used more than once.

data.name: BadScale
data.value: The print scale must be a number between 100 and 100,000.

data.name: PageTooSmall
data.value: The page size is too small for any descriptions to be printed.

data.name: NewerVersionAvailable
data.value:
Version {0} of Purple Pen is now available for download. (You are currently running version {1}.)
Would you like to download and install the latest version?

data.name: HelpFileNotFound
data.value: Help file '{0}' could not be opened.

data.name: MissingMapFile
data.value:
The map file "{0}" could not be found.
Most likely, the map file has been moved or deleted, or the Purple Pen file has been moved (possibly to a different computer). The map file must be present every time the Purple Pen event file is loaded. If you send a Purple Pen event file to another person, be sure that person has a copy of the map file also.
After pressing OK, try to find a copy of the map file on your computer.

data.name: NoUnusedControls
data.value: All controls are used in a course.

data.name: RequireStar
data.value: The customized text requires a "*" to indicate where the object being modified is placed.

data.name: AddTextSpecialExplanation
data.value: Enter the text you wish to place on the map. After pressing OK, drag the mouse to place the text in the desired location.

data.name: MapFileChanged
data.value: Another program has changed the map file "{0}". Purple Pen will now reload the map.

data.name: ChangeDescriptionLanguage
data.value: The current event has textual control descriptions in {0}. Would you like to change the language of control descriptions to {1}?

data.name: ClosePPBeforeLoadingOCAD
data.value: Purple Pen must be closed before loading the created OCAD files.

data.name: NoCoursesSelected
data.value: No courses were selected to print.

data.name: TranslatedHelpWebSite
data.value: *** If there exists a web site in the translated language that contains documentation for Purple Pen, enter the URL (including http) as the translation of this item. Otherwise leave it alone.

data.name: CrashIntro
data.value: An error has occurred. In order to help us fix the problem, please enter your email address and additional information, and send us an error report.

data.name: CrashMessage
data.value: Please tell us what you were doing in the program, to help fix the problem

data.name: CannotAddDescriptionsToAllParts
data.value: Descriptions may not be added to a course with a map exchange if "All Parts" is being displayed. Switch to the part you wish to add descriptions to, and then choose "Add Descriptions" again.

data.name: PdfConversionFailed
data.value: Pdfium PDF converter failed to read PDF file successfully

data.name: PdfResultNotReadable
data.value: Could not read result of PDF conversion from file '{0}'

data.name: CannotCreatePdfs
data.value: Cannot create PDFs for the following reason:

data.name: MapFileDeleted
data.value: The map file "{0}" has been deleted. Please try to restore the map file, then press "Ok".

data.name: BadDotNetFramework
data.value: The .NET framework on your computer does not appear to be correctly installed. Please visit http://microsoft.com/net and install the latest version of the .NET framework for your Windows operating system.

data.name: AddLineExplanation
data.value: Set the appearance of the line. After pressing OK, drag the mouse to draw the line segments in the desired location.

data.name: AddRectangleExplanation
data.value: Set the appearance of the rectangle. After pressing OK, drag the mouse to place the rectangle in the desired location.

data.name: ChangeLineAppearanceExplanation
data.value: Change the appearance of the line or rectangle.

data.name: GpxMustBeOcadMap
data.value: The map file must be an OCAD file to use GPX files.

data.name: GpxMustHaveCoordSystem
data.value: The OCAD file must have a coordinate system defined to use GPX files.

data.name: GpxMustHaveRealWorldCoord
data.value: The OCAD file must have real world coordinates defined to use GPX files.

data.name: GpxReprojectFailure
data.value: Could not reproject points; either the coordinate system or the real world coordinates in the OCAD map are wrong.

data.name: GpxUnsupportedCoordSystem
data.value: The OCAD file uses a coordinate system that is not supported by Purple Pen.

data.name: BadLength
data.value: The length for a course must be a number 0.1 - 99.9, or blank to calculate length automatically.

data.name: EnterLength
data.value: Enter length in km, or leave blank to calculate automatically

data.name: PausePrinting
data.value: Finished printing "{0}". Press OK to begin printing "{1}".

data.name: ForkSummary
data.value: Suitable for use in relays with {0} participants per team.

data.name: LoopSummary
data.value: The central control in the loop will be visited {0} times. There are {1} possible paths through the loops.

data.name: CantRearrangeSplitControl
data.value: A control that starts a fork or loop cannot be dragged to a new place in the course.

data.name: TooManyVariations
data.value: Too many total variations in this course. The number of distinct variations is limited to {0}.

data.name: VariationAlreadyExists
data.value: A variation already exists at this control.

data.name: VariationMustSelectControl
data.value: A control or leg must be selected to add a variation.

data.name: VariationNotFinish
data.value: A variation cannot be added to a finish control.

data.name: VariationNotInAllControls
data.value: A variation cannot be added to the All Controls view.

data.name: VariationNotInScoreCourse
data.value: A variation cannot be added to a score course.

data.name: VariationNotLastControl
data.value: A variation cannot be added to the last control. Add a finish control first.

data.name: BadLegNumber
data.value: '{0}' is not a valid leg number for branch '{1}'

data.name: LegNotAssigned
data.value: Leg {0} should be assigned to one of branches {1}

data.name: LegUsedTwice
data.value: Leg {0} is assigned to both branch '{1}' and branch '{2}'

data.name: CannotReadMapOOM
data.value: Cannot read map for the following reason: '{0}' Opening and re-saving the map in the latest version of OpenOrienteering Mapper may fix problems.

data.name: ImagesMayAppearBadlyLayeredInOcad10Below
data.value: Due to limitations of the OCAD file format (in OCAD 10 and below), image objects will appear underneath courses and white out areas in the exported OCAD files. Please check the OCAD files to make sure your images appear as desired.
